PARAGRAPH.STRING: (14,421 feet) is a fourteener in the Sawatch Range of the US State of Colorado.
is the second highest peak in Colorado, edging out the third highest, Mount Harvard, by one foot, and lower than Mount Elbert by 19 feet.
is the third highest peak in the contiguous United States.
is located in Lake County, approximately 10 mi (16 km) west-southwest of Leadville and 18 mi (28 km) east of Aspen.
lies in the Mount Massive Wilderness, part of the San Isabel National Forest.
was first surveyed and climbed in 1873 during the Hayden Survey of the American West; survey member Henry Gannett is credited with the first ascent.
